Exit: The Game – The Pharaoh_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Tomb
boardgame.description: On an Egyptian holiday, players are visiting the highlight of the entire journey: the stone pyramids! But after rising through the narrow, labyrinthine corridors, they discover that they've lost the rest of the group. After wandering for hours, they end up in a mysterious grave chamber _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; and suddenly the stone door closes behind them. The players are caught. On the floor is a sand-covered notebook and an ancient spinning code dial. Will the players escape in time or be forever buried under stone?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Exit: The Game _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; The Pharaoh's Tomb, players must use their team spirit, creativity, and powers of deduction to crack codes, solve puzzles, collect objects, and earn their freedom bit by bit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

The Brands_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; take on escaping from a room as a co-operative board game. As you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d expect, there are puzzles to solve with time pressure to make this harder. This one has players trapped in an Egyptian pyramid. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £10.00 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £6.96 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £5.80 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £8.70 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £8.05 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)

We only used pencil on the components which I have removed. The only permanent changes are a fold to one page, one card has been permanently marked and the insert has been cut to help solve one of the puzzles which will probably mean you will solve this one puzzle quicker than we did ;) Also you may see a feint outline on a card or two. Shipping in the UK will be £4.13.

Notes ***PAYPAL ONLY!!!*** ***WILL POST TO UK ONLY!!!*** Used but in great condition. When playing we took care not to damage anything. The ONLY thing that is any different from buying it new is that one page is folded (you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re basically instructed to do this right at the beginning so isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t an issue). As good as new really, and it was great fun. :) NOTE: I am ALSO selling Exit The Abandoned Cabin, if you buy both I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll only charge delivery once as I can send them together. :) Paypal only so we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re both protected. Postage by Royal Mail - so shipping should be about £4.
